title: There used to be a sign on US-17 southbound (before the turnoff to NC-87 going to Southport) that stated \Entering Lumber River Basin\". It was taken down last year when US-17 was repaved and never replaced.  Why wasn\'t this sign replaced?  Thank you."
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=14709
